forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
